special_text:
[+1]: Up to one target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Each player loses 1 life.
[-X]: Return target creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield.
[-7]: For each 1 life target player has less than their starting life total, create a 1/1 black Bird creature token with flying and deathtouch.
